Install Please install now so that you can try it out as we go: https://sonic-pi.net Sonic Pi runs on Mac, Windows and Linux, but unfortunately not tablets/mobiles. If you’re on a Mac… Since it’s not authorised through the App Store, installing can be a bit of a pain. You might have to open System Preferences and open Security and Privacy. Towards the bottom of this window, you should be able to click on Open Anyway. You should only have to do this the first time you run the software.
